contentList.content: Pacts can forge a Warlock's soul to a creature, object, or concept. Who or what have you signed your soul to?
Pledge yourself to an ancient fey spirit, and the sumptuous and scary qualities of their extraordinary realm.
Pledge your soul to the Hells and their deadly arsenal of fiendish arcana.
Pledge your soul to something unthinkable - an unspeakably ancient entity of entropy and control.
Pledge your soul to the Shadowfell - a force that manifests within sentient darkness.
Conjure a beam of crackling energy.

You are privy to the indescribable horrors of the universe, and as such, are able to channel an inkling of their influence. You gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>.

Sacrifice 10% of your total Hit Points to an Eldritch abomination in order to restore a Warlock Spell Slot.

While abiding by the Pact of the Blade, you wreathe your equipped weapon in Hellfire for three turns.

Sacrifice 10% of your total Hit Points to an Eldritch abomination in order to restore a Warlock Spell Slot.

While abiding by the Pact of the Chain, you recover one use of Chained Bonds and extend the duration Greater Chained Companions may remain active by three turns.

Sacrifice 10% of your total Hit Points to an Eldritch abomination in order to restore a Warlock Spell Slot.

While abiding by the Pact of Penumbra, you extend your state of Penumbral Light or Penumbral Darkness by one turn, as well as detonate nearby Eldritch Bombs.

Sacrifice 10% of your total Hit Points to an Eldritch abomination in order to restore a Warlock Spell Slot.

While abiding by the Pact of the Tome, you may cast your Eldritch Blast once as a free action.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Bargaining your life in this way renders your maximum Hit Points lowered until your next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">Long Rest</LSTag>.
Affected creature's maximum <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> have been reduced by 10% per stack of Hematic Invocation.
At the beginning of any combat encounter, restore one <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slot</LSTag>.
When dealing damage with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you deal an additional +1d12 damage.
When dealing damage with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you deal an additional +1d12 damage. This can be toggled at any time.
At the beginning of any combat encounter, restore two <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag>.
When dealing damage with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you deal an additional +2d12 damage.
When dealing damage with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you deal an additional +2d12 damage. This can be toggled at any time.

Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> against the Warlock who applied this condition. Each turn, the affected creature will attempt to make a Charisma based Saving Throw in order to remove the condition.
Your Pact manifests as raw power in way of a weapon of choice, bound to your very being.
Gain the ability to <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_PactOfTheBlade_Bind">Bind</LSTag> your equipped weapon, wreathing it in hellfire upon killing other creatures.

Your melee or ranged weapons become magical, utilizing your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls and damage.

Upon killing another creature or landing a Critical Hit with your Pact Weapon, the weapon become wreathed in flame for three turns.

Your melee weapons become magical, utilizing your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls and damage.

Upon killing another creature or landing a Critical Hit with your Pact Weapon, the weapon become wreathed in flame for three turns.

Your ranged weapons become magical, utilizing your Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls and damage.

Upon killing another creature or landing a Critical Hit with your Pact Weapon, the weapon become wreathed in flame for three turns.

Affected weapon has become magical, utilizing its owners Spellcasting Ability for Attack Rolls and damage.

Upon killing another creature or landing a Critical Hit, this weapon will become wreathed in flame for three turns.
Affected creature's weapons have become wreathed in flame, and now deals additional damage.

Once per turn, upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, your patron will grant you <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Charisma Modifier</LSTag> added to your level.

When an aggressor fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, they receive <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENTROPIC_WARD">Entropy</LSTag>. Upon landing a killing blow against a target with Entropy, all other targets within [1] must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HOLD_MONSTER">Held</LSTag> in place.

If killed by a Warlock possessing the Entropic Resonation passive, all enemies within [1] must succeed a Charisma based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HOLD_MONSTER">Held</LSTag> in place.

Every three turns, you erupt in an Eldritch Inferno, dealing [1] to all enemies within [2]. Landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> reduces the time it takes to erupt by one turn.
Affected creature will erupt in an Eldritch Inferno upon the expiration of this condition, dealing [1] to all enemies within [2].
Chained to something unknowable and fierce, your power now lies within your ability to summon and control hellish minions, from imps to undead dragons.

Utilized to summon <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PactOfTheChain_Container">Chained Companions</LSTag>. Using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_HematicInvocation">Hematic Invocation</LSTag> will restore one charge and extend the duration that Greater Chained Companions can remain active by one turn.
Affected creature is benefiting from one or more passives provided by its summoning Warlock.
Affected creature will die once this status expires.

A binding pact links you and your Chained Companions, preventing your Eldritch Blast from harming them. Their stats increase for each of your Warlock levels.

In addition, your Chained Companions will gain various passive effects depending on the passives that you receive while leveling.
Summon a familiar, bound and chained to your will. Your familiars grow in strength alongside you as you level within the Pact of the Chain.
Summon a familiar with the form of an Imp.
Summon a familiar with the form of a Quasit.
Summon a cheeky familiar with the form of a foul-mouthed Quasit.
Summon a familiar with the form of a Hellboar.
Summon a familiar with the form of a Cambion.
Summon a familiar with the form of a Azer.
Summon a familiar with the form of a Succubus.

Summon a familiar with the form of a Orthon.

The power required to maintain such a creature is overwhelmingly intense. As such, this creature will only persist for three turns. You may extend this duration by one turn each time you cast Hematic Invocation within [1] of your Chained Companion.

Summon a familiar with the form of a Spectator.

The power required to maintain such a creature is overwhelmingly intense. As such, this creature will only persist for three turns. You may extend this duration by one turn each time you cast Hematic Invocation within [1] of your Chained Companion.
Shoot an eye ray that puts its target to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEP">Sleep</LSTag>.
Conjure Greater Chained Companion: Undead Wyrmling

Summon a familiar with the form of an Undead Wyrmling.

The power required to maintain such a creature is overwhelmingly intense. As such, this creature will only persist for three turns. You may extend this duration by one turn each time you cast Hematic Invocation within [1] of your Chained Companion.
Instil <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FEARED">Terror</LSTag> in nearby foes.
Affected creature is gathering energy while airborne and is <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to all damage.
Hurl a tiny spark of fire.
Magically bolstered due to the nature of the pact this familiar's Warlock made, this Spell does not require a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>, but may only be cast once per combat.

Gain the ability to summon <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PactOfTheChain_Container">Chained Companions</LSTag>, Fiends and Abberations empowered by your Eldritch abilities and bound to your command. Chained Companions grow in strength alongside you. As your power grows, you will bind even more fearsome creatures to your will.
As your pact deepens, so too does the strength of your familiars. Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PactOfTheChain_Container">Chained Companions</LSTag> have learned new abilities.

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PactOfTheChain_Container">Chained Companions</LSTag> roll an additional damage die when attacking with their <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag>. Additionally, they have gained the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">Extra Attack</LSTag> passive. Upon each instance of damage, your Chained Companions will now inflict one stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ELDRITCH_STRIKE">Eldritch Inertia</LSTag>.
When dealing damage, you apply one stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ELDRITCH_STRIKE">Eldritch Inertia</LSTag>.

The strength of your pact has grown more potent, giving way to Eldritch power. Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PactOfTheChain_Container">Chained Companions</LSTag> have gained even more abilities.

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PactOfTheChain_Container">Chained Companions</LSTag> roll two additional damage die when attacking with their <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag>. Additionally, they have gained the <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack_2">Improved Extra Attack</LSTag> passive. Upon each instance of damage, your summons will now inflict one stack of both <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ELDRITCH_STRIKE">Eldritch Inertia</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CURSEOFHELLFIRE">Curse of Hellfire</LSTag>.

When dealing damage, you apply one <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CURSEOFHELLFIRE">Curse of Hellfire</LSTag> stack to your target. Both yourself and your summoning Warlock then make further <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> against the target.

The blood that binds you to your pact has become utterly resolute. Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_PactOfTheChain_Container">Chained Companions</LSTag> have reached the peak of their potential.
You've pledged yourself to a maddened celestial to borrow their chaotic power. Bound to the concept itself, a penumbral blend of light and dark working as an affront in tandem.

Each turn in combat, you sway between states of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PENUMBRA_LIGHT">Penumbral Light</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PENUMBRA_DARK">Penumbral Darkness</LSTag>. Each state has unique benefits which improve as you level. Casting Hematic Invocation extends the duration of either state by one turn.

Affected creature has snuffed out the light from their surroundings, and their <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast_Penumbral_Container">Penumbral Eldritch Blast</LSTag> deals Necrotic damage. When dealing damage, they deal an additional [1].

Affected creature is shedding light in a [1] radius, and their <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast_Penumbral_Container">Penumbral Eldritch Blast</LSTag> deals Radiant damage. When healing another creature, they recover an additional +1d4 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Conjure a beam of either necrotic or radiant energy.
Conjure a beam of necrotic energy.
Conjure a beam of radiant energy.
Cause your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast_Penumbral_Container">Penumbral Eldritch Blast</LSTag> to deal Necrotic damage. When dealing damage, deal an additional [1].

Shed light in a [1] radius, causing your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast_Penumbral_Container">Penumbral Eldritch Blast</LSTag> to deal Radiant damage. When healing another creature, they recover an additional +1d4 <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.

While in combat under the affects of Penumbral Darkness, targeting a corpse with your Penumbral Eldritch Blast creates a Spectre until the end of combat. The strength of the spectre depends on the size of the enemy targeted.

In addition, while in combat under the affects of Penumbral Light, you may target your teammates in order to heal them, rather than dealing damage. Effects which increase the damage you deal will not increase the amount of Hit Points you restore.

Your Penumbral Eldritch Blast now chains itself to an additional creature within [1] of your original target.

Projectiles created will chain differently depending on your initial target.

While starting your turn under the affects of Penumbral Darkness, you become Invisible.

While starting your turn under the effects of Penumbral Light, you create a Globe of Resistance where you are standing.
Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> can now chain itself to up to two additional creatures, rather than one.

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast_Penumbral_Container">Penumbral Eldritch Blast</LSTag> can now be infused with a <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slot</LSTag> in order to turn enemies into <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ELDRITCH_BOMB">Eldritch Bombs</LSTag>. At the end of three turns, an afflicted enemy, and all enemies within [1] of them, will take either [2] or [3], depending on which Penumbral Eldritch Blast was used to apply the condition. Eldritch Bombs are further modified by effects which would alter your Eldritch Blast and may be immediately detonated by casting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_HematicInvocation">Hematic Invocation</LSTag>.
Affected creature, and all other creatures within [1], will take [2] once this condition has expired.
Affected creature, and all other creatures within [1], will take massive damage once this condition has expired.

Infuse your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast_Penumbral_Container">Penumbral Eldritch Blast</LSTag> with a <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slot</LSTag> in order to turn enemies into <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ELDRITCH_BOMB">Eldritch Bombs</LSTag>. Eldritch Bombs can be immediately detonated by casting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_HematicInvocation">Hematic Invocation</LSTag>.
Erratic, eldritch power swirls within the palm of your hands, echoing out into an uncaring void, blast, after blast, after blast...
Erratic, eldritch power swirls within the palm of your hands, echoing out into an uncaring void, blast, after blast, after blast...
Erratic, eldritch power swirls within the palm of your hands, echoing out into an uncaring void, blast, after blast, after blast...

You add your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Charisma Modifier</LSTag> to the damage your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> deals, if positive. In addition, you are able to cast your Eldritch Blast with your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>. This can be toggled at any time.

Upon dealing damage with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you apply one stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ELDRITCH_STRIKE">Eldritch Inertia</LSTag>.
You are capable of dividing your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> into two separate beams. Each beam will deal [1]. This can be toggled at any time.
When you cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, the number you need in order to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by 1.
You are capable of dividing your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> into three separate beams. Each beam will deal [1]. This can be toggled at any time.
When you roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, you roll an additional damage die.

Pacts forged in deepest secrecies beget chaotic, eldritch power.
Contracts satiated will provide new forms of strength.

Dealing damage with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> applies <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BANE">Bane</LSTag> to your target for three turns. This can be toggled at any time.

When you make a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against a creature that is Large or smaller with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, immediately swap places with them. This can be toggled at any time.

Once per turn, upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, all enemies within [1] must succeed a Wisdom based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="COMPELLED_DUEL">Compelled</LSTag> to duel you on their next turn.
After casting a Spell, you become <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistant</LSTag> to all damage for one turn.
When you cast a Spell, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all damage until your next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all damage until the start of its next turn.
When you make a successful melee based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, you apply one <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CURSEOFHELLFIRE">Curse of Hellfire</LSTag> stack to your target.

Affected creature is taking [1] per turn. Whomever applied this status makes their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> when targeting the affected creature.

When an enemy fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, you may spend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to create a [1] cloud of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Darkness">Darkness</LSTag>.
When an enemy fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, create a [1] cloud of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Darkness">Darkness</LSTag>.
Dealing damage with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> heals you for a value equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Charisma Modifier</LSTag>.

Gain the ability to fire a concentrated variant of your Eldritch Blast, which pierces enemies and deals [1] at the cost of one Warlock Spell Slot.

Warlock passives which modify your Eldritch Blast also modify your Eldritch Lance.

Fire a concentrated variant of your Eldritch Blast, which pierces enemies.

Passives which modify your Eldritch Blast also modify your Eldritch Lance.

Gain the ability to channel your Eldritch Blast into your main-hand weapon at the cost of one Warlock Spell Slot.

Upon landing a blow with Eldritch Strike, you erupt with Eldritch energy, causing you to fire a beam of your Eldritch Blast at an enemy within [1].

Channel your Eldritch Blast into your main-hand weapon and strike a target.

Upon landing a blow with Eldritch Strike, you erupt with Eldritch energy, causing you to fire your Eldritch Blast at an enemy within [1].

When an enemy fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>, you gain <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TRUE_STRIKE">True Strike</LSTag> until your next instance of damage. In addition, your summoned creatures ignore all forms of physical damage <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag>.

When an enemy fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>, cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_TrueStrike">True Strike</LSTag> on yourself.

When dealing damage with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blind</LSTag> your target for one turn. This can be toggled at any time.
Once per turn, upon rolling a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on an enemy, restore one <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slot</LSTag>.

When you make a successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, your target may potentially experience a negative surge of <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag>. If under the Pact of Penumbra, targeting an ally with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast_Penumbral_Container">Radiant Eldritch Blast</LSTag> will potentially trigger a positive surge.

Upon killing a target or landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INVISIBLE">Invisible</LSTag> for three turns. In addition, your summoned creatures will become Invisible alongside you, if within [1] of you.
Using <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_HematicInvocation">Hematic Invocation</LSTag> will restore two <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slots</LSTag>, rather than one.
Upon a successful <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>, you apply one stack of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ELDRITCH_STRIKE">Eldritch Inertia</LSTag>.
When you hit a creature with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag>, you push the creature up to [1] away from you. This passive can be toggled at any time.

Increase your <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> by your level multiplied by two. In addition, your summoned creatures gain this effect, as well as an additional +4 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Gain the ability to teleport short distances by casting <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Shadewalker">Shade Walker</LSTag>.
Teleport a short distance to an area that you can see.
<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Only one Eldritch Boon may affect your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> at a time.

<LSTag Type="Image" Info="SoftWarning"/> Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_EldritchBlast">Eldritch Blast</LSTag> may not be divided into multiple beams while <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="PactOfTheTome">Pact of the Tome</LSTag> is active.
